channel.title: reading on Lauren Pickings
channel.description: Recent content in reading on Lauren Pickings

item.title: Notes
item.description: Loop: When you want to do the same action with every item in a list, you can use Python’s for loop. (p. 50) Expected an indented block after ‘for’ statement on line 3 Every indented line following the line for magician in magicians is considered inside the loop, and each indented line is executed once for each value in the list. (p. 52) Any lines of code after the for loop that are not indented are executed once without repetition.

第七条 劳动者有权依法参加和组织工会。 Article 7 Laborers shall have the right to participate in and organize trade unions in accordance with law. 工会代表和维护劳动者的合法权益，依法独立自主地开展活动。 Trade unions shall represent and safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of laborers, and stage activities independently in accordance with law. 第八条 劳动者依照法律规定，通过职工大会、职工代表大会或者其他形式，参与民主管理或者就保护劳动者合法权益与用人单位进行平等协商。 Article 8 Laborers shall take part in democratic management through workers congress, workers representative assembly, or any other forms in accordance with law, or consult with the employer on an equal footing about protection of the legitimate rights and interests of laborers.

item.title: Note 2
item.description: SOURCE: https://www.science.org/content/article/alarmed-tech-leaders-call-ai-research-pause Attracting signatures from the likes of Tesla CEO Elon Musk and Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak, the letter, released early last week, advocates for a 6-month moratorium to give AI companies and regulators time to formulate safeguards to protect society from potential risks of the technology. AI has galloped along since the launch last year of the image generator DALL-E 2, from the Microsoft-backed company OpenAI. The company has since released ChatGPT and GPT-4, two text-generating chatbots, to frenzied acclaim.

item.title: Note 1
item.description: SOURCE: https://www.nytimes.com/2023/02/24/magazine/dating-prisoner-ethics.html I have a childhood friend who recently moved into my home. Although he still has 11 years left on his sentence, he is trying to appeal for a lesser term. I am hopeful their relationship will end before he is released. Otherwise, I fear for her safety; I can see the red flags every day. A separate issue is how you and your friends would feel if your roommate asked you to accept the presence of someone who caused all of you enormous distress, even if it was many years ago.
